text: Across the Pacific is a 1942 American World War II romantic adventure movie directed by John Huston and Vincent Sherman and was based on the 1941 short story Aloha Means Good-bye by Robert Carson. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Mary Astor, Sydney Greenstreet, Kam Tong, Charles Halton, Roland Got, Frank Wilcox, Lester Matthews, Roland Drew and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1942 romance movies Category:1942 war movies Category:1940s American adventure movies Category:American war movies Category:American romance movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston Category:Movies directed by Vincent Sherman Category:1942 adventure movies
title: Across the Pacific
